name: Free Rider 2 - Ghostdog
description:
Free Rider 2 - Ghostdog is a lagless HTML5 version of Free Rider 2 based on Canvas Rider.

As the editor of Canvas Rider is no longer available (it has been taken down by Kano Games), I decided to bring it back to life with a few improvements.

Feel free to share your codes and your ghosts on the "community" itch.io-thing
